content:
CS 61A Head uGSI Summer 2022 charlottele [at] berkeley [dot] edu
Labs M, W | 8:00 PM - 9:30 PM | Online Discussions Tu, Th | 8:00 PM - 9:30 PM | Online Office Hours W | 6:00 PM - 7:00 PM | Online
F | 1:00 PM - 3:00 PM | Cory 521 Links Attendance Form: go.cs61a.org/char-attend Anonymous Feedback Form: go.cs61a.org/char-anon 1-on-1 Advising Appointments: go.cs61a.org/char-advice Join Lab Queue: go.cs61a.org/char-help View Lab Queue: go.cs61a.org/char-queue Logistics There are issues with sections.cs61a.org and howamidoing from our end, especially with those enrolled in my section after we expanded it. Your participation points may not show up because of this. We’re hoping to resolve everything by this weekend. Sorry for the inconvenience! Attendance Discussion The secret word will be given at the end of section. You must attend the entire section. Your attendance status will be verified with the Zoom meeting data. Lab The secret word will be given towards the beginning of section. You can use this time to work on the lab assignment and ask any questions. If you complete the lab assignment before section, you can submit your okpy link as the secret word for credit. Contact Please use Piazza or office hours for debugging and general logistical questions. I’m happy to respond to emails, but there are almost 100 students enrolled in my section so it’s a bit difficult. Emails should generally be reserved for personal or section-specific matters. Dozens of staff monitor Piazza all day, so you’ll recieve a much faster response there. Weekly Material Week 1 Disc 00: Getting Started pdf Disc 01: Variables and Functions + Control pdf Week 2 Disc 02: Environment Diagrams + Higher-Order Functions pdf Disc 03: Recursion + Tree Recursion pdf Week 3 Disc 04: Lists + Sequences pdf Lab 03: Recursion pdf Guides Debugging pdf Environment Diagramspdf
